title: How to Make Puppy Chow Without Peanut Butter

steps.title: Put chocolate chips and butter in a microwave-safe bowl.
steps.content: Put chocolate chips and butter in a microwave-safe bowl.

steps.title: Microwave for 1 minute and stir until well blended.
steps.content: Microwave for 1 minute and stir until well blended. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Put Chex cereal into a large bowl.
steps.content: Put Chex cereal into a large bowl. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Pour chocolate mix over the cereal and stir.
steps.content: Pour chocolate mix over the cereal and stir.

steps.title: Once cereal is coated and after it is cooled, pour cereal and powdered sugar in a bag, seal bag, and shake.
steps.content: Once cereal is coated and after it is cooled, pour cereal and powdered sugar in a bag, seal bag, and shake. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Pour into a bowl and enjoy!
steps.content: Pour into a bowl and enjoy! [4] X Research source
